summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5882 for the improvement West 56th Street, from 17th Avenue Northwest to 24th Avenue Northwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by widening pavement and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 77491, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
